JavaPlugin.name: Ifc Object Collection for MPG Calculation
JavaPlugin.description: Collects all IFC objects that are required for MPG calculations

JavaPlugin.name: Ifc Object collection for analysis
JavaPlugin.description: Returns a Json dataset that can easily be represented in COTS analysis tools

JavaPlugin.name: Mpg calculation Results
JavaPlugin.description: Returns a MpgCalculationResults object for input IfcModel.

JavaPlugin.name: bcf export for MpgObjectStore issues
JavaPlugin.description: Returns a BCF file listing the various issues identified during ifc object collection and NMD mapping.

JavaPlugin.name: floor area voxel bot
JavaPlugin.description: Calls voxel service to determine floor area of ifc construction. takes into account multiple floors
